Title: Microsoft Introduces a Fully-Managed Azure Load Testing Service in Preview
Description: Recently Microsoft announced a preview of Azure Load Testing. With this fully-managed load testing service, users can generate high-scale load with custom Apache JMeter scripts and gain actionable insights to catch and fix performance bottlenecks.
